title: Summarize the News
description: Generate a concise summary of the news article, highlighting the key points and main takeaway for readers who need a quick understanding.

title: Extract Key Events
description: Identify and list the major events mentioned in the news article, specifying the who, what, when, and where for each event.

title: Generate a Timeline
description: Construct a chronological timeline of all the events described in the news, including relevant dates and context for each event.

title: Cluster by Topic
description: Group this news article with other related articles based on shared topics or themes, providing insights into broader coverage.

title: Identify Entities
description: Extract all named entities (people, organizations, locations, etc.) mentioned in the news article and provide their context.

title: Analyze Relationships
description: Map out relationships between the key entities discussed in the news article, showing how they are connected and why it matters.

title: Gauge Sentiment
description: Analyze the tone and sentiment of the news article, determining whether it is positive, negative, or neutral, along with supporting evidence.

title: Compare News Stories
description: Compare this news article with a similar one to identify differences in coverage, tone, and key facts presented.

title: Spot Trends
description: Identify patterns or trends emerging from the news article and related news coverage, highlighting recurring topics or developments.

title: Detect Bias
description: Analyze the news article for potential bias, identifying language, framing, or omissions that may indicate a particular viewpoint.

title: Assess Credibility
description: Evaluate the credibility of the news article by analyzing the sources, evidence provided, and overall trustworthiness.

title: Verify Facts
description: Fact-check the claims made in the news article and provide supporting or refuting evidence from credible sources.

title: Detect Misinformation
description: Identify any signs of misinformation in the news article, such as false claims, misleading statements, or lack of evidence.

title: Spot Propaganda
description: Analyze the news article for propaganda techniques, such as emotional manipulation, appeals to authority, or disinformation tactics.

title: Summarize Multiple Articles
description: Generate a unified summary from multiple related news articles, capturing the main points and key differences across coverage.

title: Analyze Cross-Lingual News
description: Provide insights into news coverage across different languages, highlighting similarities and differences in reporting.

title: Translate News
description: Translate the news article into another language while preserving its meaning and cultural context.

title: Answer Questions
description: Answer specific questions related to the news article by extracting relevant information and providing concise responses.

title: Personalized Digest
description: Create a personalized news digest tailored to the user‚Äôs interests, summarizing the most relevant news articles.

title: Recommend Content
description: Suggest additional news articles or content based on the themes and topics discussed in the current news article.

title: Send News Alerts
description: Generate a real-time alert for a breaking news event or significant update, customized to the user‚Äôs preferences.

title: Generate Stories
description: Create a fictional or creative story inspired by the events described in the news article.

title: Visualize News Data
description: Generate data visualizations, such as charts or graphs, based on the information and statistics in the news article.

title: Predict Future Trends
description: Use the information in the news article to predict potential future developments or trends in the related field.

title: Automate News Reporting
description: Generate a professional, publishable news article based on structured data or key information provided.

title: Provide Financial Insights
description: Analyze the financial implications of the news article, identifying potential impacts on markets, industries, or investments.

title: Assess Risks
description: Evaluate potential risks or threats discussed in the news article, providing context and recommendations for mitigation.

title: Simplify Complex News
description: Rephrase the news article into simpler language for broader understanding, ensuring clarity without losing key details.

title: Monitor Brand Reputation
description: Analyze the news article for mentions of a specific brand or organization, assessing the tone and potential impact on reputation.
